params._rewardsDistribution: The address authorized to distribute rewards.
params._rewardsToken: The address of the ERC20 token to be distributed as rewards (e.g., SCC_USD).
params._stakingToken: The address of the ERC20 token to be staked (e.g., SCC_GOV).
params.initialOwner: The initial owner of the contract.

params.account: The address of the account to check.

returns._0: The amount of rewards earned by the account.

getReward().details: Transfers the calculated earned rewards to the user.

lastTimeRewardApplicable().details: This is either the current block timestamp or the period finish time, whichever is earlier.

returns._0: The timestamp of the last applicable reward time.

notifyRewardAmount(uint256,uint256).details: Only the `rewardsDistribution` address can call this function. Adjusts the `rewardRate` and `periodFinish` based on the new reward.

params.reward: The amount of reward tokens to add to the pool.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setRewardsDistribution(address).details: Can only be called by the owner (TimelockController).

stake(uint256).details: The staking tokens are transferred from the user to this contract. Requires `amount` to be greater than 0.

params.amount: The amount of staking tokens to stake.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unstake(uint256).details: The staking tokens are transferred from this contract back to the user. Requires `amount` to be greater than 0 and less than or equal to the staked amount.

params.amount: The amount of staking tokens to unstake.

earned(address).notice: Calculates the amount of rewards an account has earned but not yet claimed.

getReward().notice: Allows a user to claim their earned rewards.

lastTimeRewardApplicable().notice: Returns the timestamp of the last moment rewards were applicable.

lastUpdateTime().notice: The last time rewards were updated or a new reward period began.

notifyRewardAmount(uint256,uint256).notice: Notifies the staking pool of a new reward amount to be distributed.

periodFinish().notice: The timestamp when the current reward period ends.

rewardPerTokenStored().notice: Total rewards per token accumulated since the contract's inception.

rewardRate().notice: The rate at which rewards are distributed per second.

rewardsDistribution().notice: The authorized address responsible for distributing rewards (e.g., Timelock/Governance).

rewardsToken().notice: The ERC20 token distributed as rewards (e.g., SCC_USD).

setRewardsDistribution(address).notice: Sets the address of the rewards distributor.

stake(uint256).notice: Allows a user to stake `amount` of staking tokens.

staked(address).notice: Mapping from staker address to the amount of staking tokens they have staked.

stakingToken().notice: The ERC20 token that users stake (e.g., SCC_GOV).

unstake(uint256).notice: Allows a user to unstake `amount` of staking tokens.

userRewardPerTokenPaid(address).notice: Mapping from staker address to the reward index at the time of their last action (stake/claim).
